General.Name: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited
General.Description: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and management of water distribution pipeline systems in the eastern seaboard area of Thailand. It produces and supplies tap water; provides waste treatment, waterworks management, engineering services, operation and maintenance management, and renewable energy management services; recycles water; and supplies raw water. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
